p1: Startup Framework is a website builder for professionals. Startup Framework contains components and complex blocks (PSD+HTML Bootstrap themes and templates) which can easily be integrated into almost any design. All of these components are made in the same style, and can easily be integrated into projects, allowing you to create hundreds of solutions for your future projects.
p2: You can preview Startup Framework here.

p1: Start Bootstrap's Agency theme is based on Golden, a free PSD website template built by Mathavan Jaya. Golden is a modern and clean one page web template that was made exclusively for Best PSD Freebies. This template has a great portfolio, timeline, and meet your team sections that can be easily modified to fit your needs.
p2: You can download the PSD template in this portfolio sample item at FreebiesXpress.com.
